title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Results
text: May 9, 2018 / 10:24 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago UPDATE 2- Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Results Men's Singles 2nd Round .. 1-Rafael Nadal (ESP) beat Gael Monfils (FRA) 6-3 6-1 13-Diego Schwartzman (ARG) beat Feliciano Lopez (ESP) 7-5 2-6 6-2 Borna Coric (CRO) beat Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) 6-0 6-2 5-Dominic Thiem (AUT) beat Federico Delbonis (ARG) 4-6 6-3 7-5 Philipp Kohlschreiber beat 11-Roberto Bautista Agut 6-3 4-6 7-5 (GER) (ESP) 6-Kevin Anderson (RSA) beat Mikhail Kukushkin (KAZ) 5-7 7-6(3) 6-2 8-David Goffin (BEL) beat Robin Haase (NED) 7-5 6-3 Kyle Edmund (GBR) beat 10-Novak Djokovic (SRB) 6-3 2-6 6-3 7-John Isner (USA) beat Ryan Harrison (USA) 7-6(1) 7-6(7) Pablo Cuevas (URU) beat Albert Ramos-Vinolas (ESP) 6-1 6-7(2) 6-2 Leonardo Mayer (ARG) beat Fernando Verdasco (ESP) 6-2 6-1 2-Alexander Zverev (GER) beat Evgeny Donskoy (RUS) 6-2 7-5
